name: Tsukuba Phone Shop
description: A specialty store for mobile phones, offering the latest smartphones and accessories at competitive prices.

name: Sakura Bakery
description: Local bakery famous for its pretty appearance and bread made with cherry blossoms.

name: Aoi Fitness Center
description: It has the latest training machines and offering personal training and Yoga programs for of all ages.

name: Tsukuba Fishing Tackle Shop
description: High quality fishing gear, from beginner to professional equipment, perfect for fishing lover.

name: Tsukuba Appliance Store
description: A large appliance store that carries a variety of home appliances imported from abroad as well as domestically produced products.

name: Tsukuba Fruit Cafe
description: The restaurant is well known for its desserts made with fresh, organically grown fruits.

name: Tsukuba Construction
description: Creating earthquake-resistant commercial and residential construction projects for the safety and comfort of local residents.
